comment: The positive integers are a subset of the complex numbers. Remark: this could also be proven from ~ nnssre and ~ ax-resscn at the cost of using more axioms. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2004.) Reduce dependencies on axioms. (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 4-Oct-2022.)
